title: peoples.travel
author: peoples.travel
created_time: March 01, 2023, 03:35:06 AMLast edit: March 01, 2023, 04:12:46 AM by peoples.travel
content: Peoples.Travel is a platform for everything related to travel using Bitcoin. We hope you can share every detail of your experiences or interact with other members, share the multimedia of your trips with Bitcoin, everything related to hotels, restaurants and airlines.Features⭐Share your experiences of Traveling with Bitcoin.⭐Post your photos of trips paid with Bitcoin⭐Publish your paid travel videos with Bitcoin⭐Share the places where they accept Bitcoin like hotels, restaurants and airlines.Peoples.TravelBitcoin Travel

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: I thought it's those type of booking websites but it seems you are a forum. Good luck, it's hard to get people in a forum these days though. It requires a lot of advertising and social media activities to bring interested people in a forum. Facebook groups, pages are lot more easier for people to socialize.
